sub_concepts.name: Kinetic Energy
sub_concepts.definition: Energy possessed by an object due to its motion.

sub_concepts.name: Potential Energy
sub_concepts.definition: Energy that is stored in an object due to its position.

sub_concepts.name: Mechanical Energy
sub_concepts.definition: Sum of kinetic energy and potential energy in an object.

sub_concepts.name: Thermal Energy
sub_concepts.definition: Internal energy of a system that arises from the motion of its particles.

sub_concepts.name: Chemical Energy
sub_concepts.definition: Energy stored in the bonds of chemical compounds.
